department: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
description: This is a request for a L-PBF 3D metal Printer W0114-230007. The delivery of one (1) Laser Powder Bed fusion machine must be capable of processing Ti-6Al-4V titanium feedstock material to manufacture parts (as per 4.0 technical requirement).
full_summary:
*L-PBF 3D Metal Printer (W0114-230007) - Request for Proposal*

**Key Details:**

* **Tender Reference:** WS4256236028-Doc4285330755
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** December 6, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Location:** Canada
* **End-User Entity:** Royal Military College of Canada (RMCC)

**Objective:**'
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites suppliers to submit proposals for the delivery of one (1) L-PBF 3D metal printer capable of processing Ti-6Al-4V titanium feedstock material. The successful supplier will also have the option to purchase a two (2) year preventative maintenance (PM) package.

**Key Requirements:**

* The L-PBF 3D metal printer must meet the technical requirements outlined in Section 4.0 of the tender document.
* Bidders must demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criterion. Failure to do so may result in the offer being deemed non-responsive.

**Important Dates:**

* Publication Date: November 2, 2023
* Amendment Date: November 28, 2023
* Tender Closing Date and Time: December 6, 2023, at 14:00 EST

**How to Participate:**

* Interested suppliers can access the tender documents through the Ariba Discovery portal.
* Required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on December 6, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Late submissions may be declared non-responsive.

**Language of Tender:** The official language of this tender is English, but the tender documentation is available in both English and French.

**Contact Information:**

If you have any questions or require clarification on any aspect of this tender, please contact Allison Fernandez, PSPC, at (613) 340-5724 or allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Links to Tender Documents:**

English: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17879016?extsite=Mjc4NzkwMTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17879016?extsite=Mjc4NzkwMTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

French: [https://discovery.ariba.com
